name: Yufo: New Planet
description:
Genre:

3D, Shooter, Open World.

Story:

The year is 2076, in a planet named Bekasi, a planet which the majority of the population are aliens, there lived a young alien named Yufo. Someday, he will take the last mission to becoming an adult alien. That mission will decide whether he is worth of becoming a resident in this planet or to perish from this planet. The mission he has to do is to invade another planet and take their resources as there is a overpopulation crisis in Bekasi, the planet is in need of another place to live and migrate to. Because of that, his mission is to find another planet with stable resources and secure the planet so that it is safe for the aliens to migrate and live to. 

Today, Yufo has made the decision to invade a planet named Earth. Departuring from Bekasi with his UFO, he has arrived on Earth safely. He looked around and there was an abundant amount of resources. Things looked nice until he noticed there was another living being called humans living in this planet. He identified these humans as a threat to aliens and decided to perish them from Earth. There’s just one problem, there are a lot of humans living in this planet, and he has been given a time limit to invade this planet. If he doesn’t exterminate all the humans in the limited time, he will fail his mission. Will he be able to secure Earth in the limited time?

Character:

Yufo.

Objective:

Secure the planet Earth by exterminating all the humans and buildings in a certain amount of time.

Gameplay:

You play as Yufo who’s riding a UFO. You can shoot lasers from the UFO to destroy buildings and exterminate humans.
